answers.answer: You will be fine as long as you don't have urinary retention (have you been able to urinate?) As long as you don't have that problem then you will be fine. Sorry you are having this reaction. Please make a note of this and let them know next time. You should find out what drops they used to dilate your eyes. There are different meds.Sincerely,Timothy D. McGarity, M.D.

question: I got my eyes dilated today.  I am diabetic and have diabetic retinopathy and mild cataracts.  I have had my eyes dilated in the past but I am concerned this time.  About a half hour after the exam, I started to feel lighted headed, dizzy, nauseous and loss of balance while standing and/or walking.  Is this a side effect?  What should I do it has been 10 hours already.
title: Please help!  Diabetes and Eye Care
